pageContext.claim: “I'll tell you the first call I get, If we win, we gotta win. First call I get will be from the Supreme leader [of Iran], as he calls himself the Supreme leader. I refuse to call him the Supreme leader, but he calls himself the supreme leader. The first call will be from the supreme leader. And you know what? I'd love to make a deal with him, you know why? We don't wanna do anything bad, we just can't let him have a nuclear weapon, if that's okay. Can't let him have it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's efforts to dismantle the Iran deal negotiated by Obama have been rejected by European allies and Iran has ramped up its nuclear efforts. Given the poor diplomatic results, Trump keeps claiming Iran is eager to negotiate a new deal but there is no evidence of that.
